title: How to add a now TV to my smart TV - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are talking about the internet delivery of Sky channels in the UK, you will either have it already as one of the apps or you can add one of their boxes. Connect that to your TV using the supplied HDMI lead or plug the latest stick versions into the HDMI socket direct. You may have to connect a transformer to power it, that varies by model.
